description:
As Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura prepare for the exam, a ninja with short bobbed hair and thick eyebrows named Rock Lee appears. Lee proceeds to challenge Sasuke to a duel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chunin Challenge: Rock Lee vs. Sasuke!
Kiai 120% Nau de Rock na Chousenjou!
Výzva chuninů: Rock Lee vs. Sasuke
Wyzwanie Chunina: Rock Lee kontra Sasuke!
ศึกท้าดวลสไตล์ร็อค
気合い120% ナウでロックな挑戦状!
